am_devices_i3c_mb85rc1mt.c File Reference

Fujitsu MB85RC1MT 128K FRAM Memory Driver with I3C Interface. More...

Detailed Description

Fujitsu MB85RC1MT 128K FRAM Memory Driver with I3C Interface.

#include <string.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include "am_mcu_apollo.h"

#include "am_util.h"
